title: Boards account says i'm level 6, but i'm level 11 in game.
body:
I wanted to post something but cant.

Edit: Just checked again and it changed.

replies.body: Thanks Kokua!  Sometimes an account will need to sync to the boards, especially when posting for the first time.  Be sure to check out the [Syncing Tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)if you run into anymore hiccups.

It seems you figured it out already, but I'll post this again in case anyone else has the same issue as you.

Posting will sync your in game level with the forum, but you can also use the [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) to update your level too.
